attributes.action: MAKE EALING COUNCIL USE THE COUNCIL TAX COLLECTED FROM RESIDENTS IN GREENFORD, NORTHOLT AND SOUTHALL TO IMPROVE THESE AREAS INSTEAD OF SPENDING IT ALL ON EALING BROADWAY AND SOUTH EALING
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No money is put into improving the roads, buildings or environment in Northolt, Greenford or Southall.  Those of us who live there wonder what our council tax is spent on....until we go to Ealing Broadway and see where it has all gone.
